text: Te uttara detila, pavitra ahesa tu! Svatah amacyasathi he yogya navhate ki tujhyakherija dusaryanna apala mitra- sahayyaka banavile asate. Khari gosta asi ki tu yanna ani yancya vadavadilanna sukha- sampannata pradana keli yetheparyanta ki he bodha- upadesa visarale. He loka vinasasa patraca hote
